title: Drumond de Meneses (Antero)
body: He was the son of Servúlo Drumond de Meneses, born in Funchal on December 1, 1830, and obtained a doctorate in medicine from the faculty of Montpellier in 1856. He was a doctor for the party of the Municipal Chamber of Funchal and a physician of the Mutual Aid Association on September 4, 1862. He died in Lisbon on September 30, 1916. E.: L'Etiologie comme source du diagnostic médical, Montpellier, 1856.

Funchal: Birthplace of Antero Drumond de Meneses
Montpellier: Location where Antero Drumond de Meneses obtained a doctorate in medicine

1830: Birth of Antero Drumond de Meneses
1856: Obtaining a doctorate in medicine from the faculty of Montpellier
1862: Antero Drumond de Meneses became a physician of the Mutual Aid Association
1916: Death of Antero Drumond de Meneses
